translations: 懒汉；游手好闲的人；[机]惰轮；中间齿轮

sentences.sentence: This man was no idler - he worked harder than anyone I knew.
sentences.translation: 此人一点也不是懒汉-他比我认识的其他任何人都更勤快。

sentences.sentence: He paid his attention all to this thing, as an idler might observe the feat of a juggler, without interest in the outcome.
sentences.translation: 他把全部注意力都集中在这件事上，就像一个游手好闲的人在观看一场魔术师技艺表演，对最后的结果并不感兴趣。

sentences.sentence: Bank idler: hope to find my teachers and friends here!
sentences.translation: 江边闲人：希望能在这里找到我的老师和朋友！
